doc.title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
doc.author: Eli Effenberger
doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Duck Soup...The Revenge by Eli Effenberger

main.head: Duck Soup...The Revenge
main.p:
I've been drawing all of my life, creating something out of nothing has always been
my passion. I have been doing Fashion Design for the last years, and came back into Illustration only recently. I have only a bit over a year's experience illustrating digitally, but the more I learn, the more I seem to fall in-love with it.
I guess childhood passions are the most persevering ones.
